Planes

Planes are a common type of subdivision within creations. The Creation Marlien is divided into a number of planes.

Planes are more common among magical creations.

Marlien

Planes of Marlien

Depth

Marlien's structure can be divided into three, discrete depths: Astral, Ethereal, and Material. In common parlance the Astral is refereed to as a 'higher' plane, but more precisely the Material is the shallowest, and the Astral the deepest of the three. Whether or not Marlien extends deeper, past the Astral, remains unknown. Planes only truly exist at the surface, Material depth, where they are a manifestation of will expressed from greater depths, a product of residual will from activities long ago, or merely the design of the Dead Gods. The primary, most balanced and diverse, of these planes is named The Prime Material Plane.

Physical bodies in Marlien gravitate strongly towards the Material depth, and it is there where all unclaimed anicca finds itself at rest, in the shapeless plane named Solitude. atman typically reside in the Astral, even when bound to physical vessels at other depths, and are usually only drawn into the Material forcefully, or in trying to maintain a strong connection with a dying vessel. Similarly, physical bodies may only be drawn from, and held outside of the Material by the strong and sustained will of an atman; such is true even for the entities who reside physically, and permanently at the Astral depth, which is why these are predominantly beings of great power and intellect.

Astral Projection

The practice of willing one's own perception into the perspective of the atman instead of the physical vessel is known as Astral_Projection. With practice, a capable entity might learn to move its atman separately from its physical vessel, and even see through the depths to the Ethereal or Material from that perspective.

Specters

An unbound atman in the Material depth naturally attracts motes of unclaimed anicca, manifesting as a visible specter, though it may suppress this attraction if it is intelligent.

Everything Below Here is Old

Planes in the Creation Marlien are divided into the Materium and Immaterium. While Solitude is the base form of the Materium, which is filled with both mana and anicca, The Astral Plane is the base form of the Immaterium, which is primarily filled with mana and divine atman, appearing as void populated by nebulae and other strange forms.

The Materium and Immaterium overlap, and are separated by Ethereal.

Planar Travel

Planar travel in Marlien is neither simple nor safe; only planes which intersect eachother may be trivially passed between, and then only at the points of intersection, while other areas or entire planes which are partly or fully adjacent require a significant effort, and others pose further challenges.

In the case of The Prime Material Plane and The Halls of the Charon for example, the two are at no point adjacent, and are in fact a great distance apart within the Materium. The quickest way to traverse this distance is to first move to some immaterial plane, but doing so near to a populated Spire, Planet, or other body, will likely attract the attention of myriad entities within The Astral Plane. This is why lesser Charon and other beings able to survive in Space sometimes rise up and away from such bodies before plane shifting.
